explains: n. 毕业；毕业典礼；（容器或设备上的）刻度；在刻度尺上按度数（或其他比例分配）的划分
wordGroup: graduation thesis 毕业论文；毕业设计
graduation ceremony n. 毕业典礼
graduation field work 毕业实习
graduation examination 毕业考，毕业考试

sentences.en: It was my first job after graduation.
sentences.cn: 那是我毕业后的第一个工作。

sentences.en: My whole family came to my graduation.
sentences.cn: 我的家人都来参加了我的毕业典礼。

sentences.en: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
